short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into a gateway to a mesmerizing desert fantasy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into a surreal desert landscape where towering rock formations rise against a vibrant sunset. Reflections ripple gently on a tranquil body of water, creating an otherworldly ambiance. Perfect for those seeking a blend of calm and adventure in their browsing experience.
Features:

- Stunning Background
- Customizable Shortcuts
- Integrated Clock and Weather
- News
